review_title: Tutoring Is a Great Student Job
job_title: Peer Tutor in Corpus Christi, TX
pros: Flexible hours, as in exchanging working hours for other days to accommodate for more study time for exams. Another pro is the feeling like family as well as holiday celebrations. Comfortable job to work part-time while taking 12 credit hour course loads as it only requires mental effort and does not really involve physical labor at the tutoring center.
cons: The winter break slims down working hours to zero, so be ready to anticipate zero income for the most of December and January as a peer tutor.

job_title: Student Worker in El Paso, TX
pros: The discounts to distinguished speakers, and educational or student conferences or forums. The networking opportunities, due to the diverse population of people that walk through the door.
cons: You are the face of the college, and are constantly under the spot light. It's important to always stay on your toes and maintain a professional demeanor because you never know who you'll be speaking too.

job_title: Teaching/Lab Assistant in Corpus Christi, TX
pros: The staff and faculty are extremely helpful and delightful to work with. The students are very engaging and receptive to the lectures and especially the hands on lab. Since the classes are smaller than a university, you feel like you really reach the students and give them full effort when teaching. Payment ($/hr) was higher than expected. Constant occasions to take on more responsibility and mentor type roles with students.
cons: Working part-time, the hours can be filled pretty easily during the week. You need to learn how to work quick and plan out your schedule before (and keep to it).

job_title: Tutor in Corpus Christi, TX
pros: Very flexible hours, staff is sociable and it makes working with the students a pleasure.
cons: Would like more hours, but I know that's not possible.

job_title: Software Developer in Corpus Christi, TX
pros: Worked well with other departments and the really liked my work.  I was able to advise other departments on how I could program their needs.
cons: My supervisor set the tone for a negative environment as it reflected on the staff.

job_title: Math Lab Tutor in Corpus Christi, TX
pros: Part time flexible schedule.  Quiet relaxed atmosphere.  Fun to tutor.
cons: Pay was $10/hr.  But that is more than what other colleges were paying undergraduates.  So it is really a pro.

job_title: Dean in Corpus Christi, TX
pros: Ample professional development opportunities (and funds for development), employees recognized and rewarded for performance, opportunities for advancement, excellent salary and benefits package (especially for a community college), childcare on one campus
cons: childcare facility only on one campus
